"Ran": "Based on your activities so far, you've been cleared to join the Independent Corps in the Retem Region."
"You'll be working with the most highly-skilled of Retem and Aelio's ARKS, working together to eliminate powerful enemies all over the Region."
"You can join the Independent Corps operations from any Ryuker Device, or from the World Map."
"With that, I wish you good luck."
